name: mPool
description: mPool is a decentralized staking platform designed to make staking easy, trustless, and rewarding for both token projects and their communities. It enables any project to create their own staking pool within minutes â€” without giving up token custody, without relying on risky third-party contracts, and with complete transparency on rewards, lock durations, performance, and fees. Projects gain utility, holders earn passive income, and everything runs securely on-chain.
